content: needed to obtain correct gauge* listed as smallest in pattern us size h-8/5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* listed as medium in pattern us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* listed as largest in pattern yarn needle optional clover pom pom maker i used the large size for the adult medium version **gauge** 10 scbl = 2 25 5 5 cm across with medium hook *for best fit always check your gauge * 13 double_crochet = 4 10 cm across with largest hook *for best fit always check your gauge * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/11/21/crochet-elf-hat-pattern/
